name: TropicIsle (DEMO)
description:
As this is a demo version, the product is subject to change!

TropicIsle is a StarTropics inspired indie game developed by Crooked Beaker and Joshimations. Both part of Good Friend Studios.

TropicIsle takes place in the middle of the foreign seas. A small island sits in the middle of it. Blake arrives on shore and ventures into it. What will lie ahead on the desert island(?), who knows.

HAPPY 30th STARTROPICS!

This game sadly does not support Dinput. Only Xinput and keyboard.

Xbox:
Directional Pad & Control Stick - Movement
Start/Menu - Start
B - Jump/confirm
A - Attack
X - Item
Y - Item Menu (Analog stick doesn't work on item menu YET)


KEYBOARD:
Arrows - Movement
Enter - Start
Z - Jump/confirm
X - Attack
A - Open Item Menu
S - Use Item
Q - Previous Item
W - Next Item
